lines: 1.Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, Ndi ndothe a thi koni
Ndi Mu pfe e tsini na nne, A tshi n-kuvhatedza.
Muya wanga si ofhe, Litsha a range phanda;
Naho a tshi nnyisa hothe, ndi do di mu tevhela.
2. Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, Lutendo lu tshi dzima,
U do amba a phumudzo, A sa konwi nga munwe.
3. Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, kha u tshimbila hanga;
Kha madumbu na kha duvha, na vhukati ha mipfa.
4. Kha ndi ende na Mutshidzi, A linde ndila yanga;
Ndi vhuye ndi swike Yordan, Na fhala seli hawo.
